situation.title: Job loss
situation.meta_description: Advice and recommendations in case you lose your job.

content.processed:
If you have lost your job, it is an unpleasant situation. The following lines are here to help you find a new job as quickly as possible. Ideally, right before you become unemployed. The whole procedure of what to do was written by the Labor Office on its website here. 

If you have returned from an EU / EEA / Switzerland countries where you have terminated your employment, information on what needs to be done can be find on website. 

We wish you good luck and just to be sure, we remind you that you will find information about possible compensations, benefits and also where to look for professional psychological help if necessary on this website.
